summary: Adds a whole new Nordic Dungeon to the game, featuring Draugr fights and pretty visuals
descriptionHtml:
Adds a whole new Nordic Dungeon to the game, featuring Draugr fights and pretty visuals.

--- Changelog
-- V1.0
- Initial Release

--V2.0
-Fixed various graphical errors
-Doubled the size of the dungeon
-Balanced loot
-Tweaked the exterior of the dungeon
-Added a new exit
-Varied the lighting in the dungeon

--V2.1
- Improved Navmesh and Edge Detection

If you have any CC, Bug Reports or Suggestions please leave them in the comments, thanks.
author: SeanMcBrooks
